text: Robin Dutt (born 24 January 1965) is a German football coach, executive and former player. He is the manager of Austrian club Wolfsberger AC.Standard.at (German) ==Player career== As player he played for different amateur clubs in Germany. ==Manager== As manager of SC Freiburg he reached the promotion to the Bundesliga. ==Managerial statistics== Soccerway:Robin Dutt Managerial record by team and tenure Team Nat From To Record TSF Ditzingen 1 July 2000 30 June 2002 Stuttgarter Kickers II 1 July 2002 27 October 2003 Stuttgarter Kickers 27 October 2003 30 June 2007 SC Freiburg 1 July 2007 30 June 2011 Bayer Leverkusen 1 July 2011 1 April 2012 Werder Bremen 27 May 2013 25 October 2014 VfL Bochum 12 February 2018 26 August 2019 Wolfsberger AC 1 July 2021 Present Total Category:1965 births Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Living people Category:Wolfsberger AC managers Category:SC Freiburg managers ==References==
title: Robin Dutt
